refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para: This function generates Certificate Signing Request (CSR). The function return 1 upon success, sql error on failure. The new certificate can be exported in PEM format with xenc_pem_export(cli_key_name).

refsect2.title: ca_key_name
refsect2.para: The name of CA private key which will be used to sign certificate.

refsect2.title: cli_key_name
refsect2.para: The name of a key which will be created and will contains the client certificate.

refsect2.title: days_validity
refsect2.para: How many days will be valid the certificate.

refsect2.title: hours_validity
refsect2.para: How many hours will be valid the certificate.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: the function returns 1 upon success, sql error on failure.
